frontend_dev.title: Modern Frontend Architecture
frontend_dev.description: Building modern and responsive user interfaces using cutting-edge technologies. Specialized in creating dynamic and interactive web applications with React 19 and Next.js.
backend_dev.title: Scalable Backend & API Design
backend_dev.description: Developing robust and scalable server-side solutions with Node.js and Next.js. Creating efficient APIs and implementing secure authentication systems.
database_dev.title: Data Strategy & Modeling
database_dev.description: Designing and implementing efficient database structures using MongoDB and Db2. Optimizing queries and ensuring data integrity for high-performance applications.
fullstack_dev.title: End-to-End Product Engineering
fullstack_dev.description: Delivering complete web applications from concept to deployment. Integrating frontend, backend, and legacy systems seamlessly for optimal user experience and performance.
